name: Hyundai i20 N Line
description: The price of Hyundai i20 N Line, a 5 seater Hatchback, ranges from Rs. 9.99  - 12.52 Lakh. It is available in 8 variants, with an engine of 998 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. i20 N Line comes with 6 airbags. Hyundai i20 N Line has a ground clearance of 170 mm  and is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 0 kmpl for i20 N Line.
